price: Ó sọ pé: “Olúwa mi mọ ọ̀rọ̀ tó ń bẹ nínú sánmọ̀ àti ilẹ̀. Òun ni Olùgbọ́, Onímọ̀.”
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّي يَعۡلَمُ ٱلۡقَوۡلَ فِي ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ وَهُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbī yaʿlamu al-qawla fī al-samāi wal-arḍi wahuwa al-samīʿu al-ʿalīmu
